name: Shikakui Atama wo Maru Kusuru: Mainichi Minna no Challenge Hen
overview: All the family challenges difficult questions and good questions. You can enjoy your family together in the match quiz format. It carefully selected over 2,000 questions of Japanese language, mathematics, society, science, including kanji problems and calculation problems. You can use the Nintendo DS series main unit as a controller using wireless communication. If you use the Nintendo DS series itself, you can write and answer the kanji problem, and calculate problems can be answered with numeric inputs, so the range of pleasure is expanded. You can enjoy it with your family to participate in television quiz shows.
